comments.commentValue: // 64 and 32 are the margins of the chart axes, determined by inspection
comments.codeValue:
<View
            style={{
              position: "absolute",
              left: 64 + (props.chartWidth - 64) * splitPercent,
              top: 16,
              bottom: 32,
              width: 2,
              opacity: 0.7,
              backgroundColor: colors.primary,
            }}
          />
        )}
